unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Essential for us farmers in Punjab. Remember last year's unseasonal rains on 26/01/2023? Totally wrecked Balwinder Singh's cotton crop. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helped him somewhat. Applying for it again on 15/08/2024, hopefully before 17:00 hrs. Any tips from fellow kisaans? Thinking about Bajaj Allianz this time. Heard they are good in Haryana. Rs. 2000 per acre seems steep though.
normalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Essential for us farmers in Punjab. Remember last year's unseasonal rains on twenty-sixth January two thousand and twenty-three? Totally wrecked Balwinder Singh's cotton crop. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helped him somewhat. Applying for it again on fifteenth August two thousand and twenty-four, hopefully before seventeen hundred hours. Any tips from fellow kisaans? Thinking about Bajaj Allianz this time. Heard they are good in Haryana. Rupee two thousand per acre seems steep though.
